attributes.action: put pressure on Duncan Fletcher to select Monty Panesar for the Third Test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After England's two dismal performances, our standing on the world stage is being damaged. England must pick the best bowlers available - the team must take twenty wickets to win a match, and the team needs to win two of the next three matches. Panesar is clearly England's second best specialist bowler - Mr. Fletcher must select him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
